docs.snippet: For many of the expected 400,000 visitors to New York City, the transportation options for getting to their stadium seats on Feb. 2 are not their usual ones....
docs.lead_paragraph: For many of the expected 400,000 visitors to New York City, the transportation options for getting to their stadium seats on Feb. 2 are not their usual ones.
docs.abstract: Organizers of Super Bowl XLVIII are trying to persuade well-heeled visitors to take public transportation to game, citing traffic issues and limited parking at MetLife Stadium; plan poses logistical problem of shepherding hordes of out-of-towners across Hudson River to East Rutherford, NJ, from Manhattan (Series: Super Bowl XLVIII).

headline.main: For Super Bowl Jet-and-Helicopter Set, Urging Buses and Rail
headline.print_headline: For Super Bowl Jet-and-Helicopter Set, Urging Buses and Rail

docs.snippet: North Korea will send men's and women's football teams to South Korea for this year's Asian Games in Incheon, its official news agency said on Monday, despite simmering political tension between the neighbours....

docs.snippet: Bahrain-based investment firm Gulf Finance House (GFH) said on Monday it was offloading 75 percent of English football club Leeds United to a consortium of British investors and would retain a 10 percent stake following the sale....
